seo.description: Visualize your life one week at a time. An interactive calendar showing your entire life as a grid of weeks, helping you appreciate the finite nature of time.
seo.descriptionWithAge: I'm {{years}} years and {{weeks}} weeks old. Visualizing my life one week at a time with this interactive calendar.
seo.keywords: life in weeks, life calendar, time visualization, life expectancy, week grid, life stages, mortality, time management, life planning
